transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sir, mai MM ke floor solution se bol raha hu.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ah, sir ye abhi jaisa mera leads khatam ho gaya.
Customer: To aur leads chahiye to uske liye kya kar sakte hai sir?
Executive: Sir kis mein the wo company company mein?
Customer: MM ke floor solution hai sir mera company India mart mein.
Executive: Accha MM ke floor solution.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To sir uske liye purchase karna padta hai ya to sir ek kaam kariye abhi mai thoda sa lunch pe tha.
Customer: Mai aapko abhi connect karta hu.
Executive: Sir nahi hota hai na call kijiye.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Ha mai lunch ke baad connect karta hu mai call karta hu.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's leads have finished.

- Wants to know how to get more leads.



Resolution:

- Executive said he is on lunch.

- Executive will call back after lunch.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after lunch.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up
